home.description: I've started building this campus-life app for Whitworth students with one main goal: create a digital campus community, a platform where students can connect with each other, discover events, and navigate Whitworth with ease.

hub.name: HUB
hub.desc: Heart of Whitworth, HUB is a place where students can come to relax, study, and socialize.

library.name: Library
library.desc: Whitworth's Library, you can find all the books you need here, find some quiet spot to study, or just relax and read a book. Also you can use colored printers or computers here.

soccer.name: Soccer Field
soccer.desc: Soccer Field of Whitworth, usually used for soccer games and practices.

omache.name: Omache Field
omache.desc: Omache Field, second soccer field of Whitworth, usually used for soccer games and practices.

marks.name: Marks Field
marks.desc: Marks Field, usually used for softball/baseball games and practices.

pinebowl.name: Pine Bowl
pinebowl.desc: Pine Bowl, football field of Whitworth, usually used for football games and practices.

fieldhouse.name: Fieldhouse
fieldhouse.desc: Fieldhouse, usually used for basketball and volleyball games/practices.

aquatics.name: Aquatics
aquatics.desc: Aquatics Center, usually used for swimming and diving games/practices.

tennis.name: Tennis Bubble
tennis.desc: Tennis Bubble, usually used for tennis games/practices.

urec.name: U-Rec
urec.desc: U-Rec, main gym of Whitworth, has 3 fields used for basketball, volleyball, and other games/practices and also has bunch of gym equipment for students to use.

mcmillan.name: McMillan Residence Hall
mcmillan.desc: McMillan Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

ballard.desc: Ballard Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

chapel.desc: Chapel, usually used for worship and socializing.

warren.desc: Warren Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

arend.desc: Arend Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

stewart.desc: Stewart Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

village.desc: Village, usually used for residence and socializing.

oliver.name: Oliver Residence Hall
oliver.desc: Oliver Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

duvall.name: Duvall Residence Hall
duvall.desc: Duvall Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

boppell.name: Boppell Residence Hall
boppell.desc: Boppell Residence Hall, usually used for residence and socializing.

cowles.name: Cowles Auditorium
cowles.desc: Main auditorium for events and performances.

events.noEvents: No events scheduled. Create the first event!

campusGuide.title: Campus Guide
campusGuide.description: Discover essential locations and resources around Whitworth campus. Find study spaces, dining options, athletic facilities, and more to help you navigate campus life.

whatToBring.title: What to Bring
whatToBring.content: We're glad you will be a part of our community. Following are lists of items you'll need to bring to Whitworth along with items you may want to bring with you when you arrive on campus. Additionally, please read What's Provided for information about what is already in your room and What Not to Bring, which details items not allowed in the residence halls.

healthServices.title: Health Services
healthServices.content: Access health services, counseling, and wellness programs. Located in convenient campus locations to support your physical and mental well-being.

vehicleParking.title: Vehicle Registration & Parking
vehicleParking.description: A campus should be a 'park for the mind' where green spaces are to be cherished and natural beauty maintained.
vehicleParking.content: All personal vehicles parked on campus must be registered with security services. Faculty, staff and students should display a valid parking permit on their personal vehicle (including motorcycles) at all times.

dining.title: Campus Dining Services (Sodexo)
dining.description: Meal plans, menus, and dining hours
dining.content: Explore dining options provided by Sodexo, including daily menus, meal plan information, nutrition facts, and dining hall hours. Find what's being served today at the HUB and other campus locations.

foodDrink.title: Food & Drink
foodDrink.description: Dining options and cafes across campus
foodDrink.content: Explore various dining locations including the HUB, Pines Cafe, and other campus eateries. Find meal plans, grab-and-go options, and coffee shops.

hub.title: HUB
hub.description: Central hub for dining, studying, and socializing
hub.content: The HUB is the heart of campus life, offering multiple dining options, study spaces, and meeting areas. Perfect for grabbing a meal between classes or collaborating on group projects.

studySpaces.title: Study Spaces
studySpaces.description: Quiet areas and libraries for focused studying
studySpaces.content: Find the perfect study spot across campus. From the main library to quiet corners in academic buildings, discover spaces that match your study style and needs.

library.title: Library
library.description: Main campus library with extensive resources
library.content: Access books, research databases, study rooms, and computer labs. The library offers both quiet study areas and collaborative spaces for group work.

social.title: Instagram Feed
social.description: Latest posts from Whitworth Instagram accounts
